title: Collaborative Math Problem-Solving Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A collaborative process for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to solve mathematics problems encountered in actual work

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems by utilizing effective communication strategies within groups
Learners can creatively manage conflicts arising during collaborative processes through peer assessment
Learners can develop and apply mathematical models required in real-world professional settings (medical statistics, legal data analysis, technical design calculations)

resources: Math Problem Scenario Kit (Based on Real-World Career Situations)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
